category-def.name: RSSOwl 2.0 M5a for Eclipse
category-def.label: RSSOwl 2.0 M5a for Eclipse
category-def.description: This will install RSSOwl 2.0 preview into your Eclipse. RSSOwl 2.0 requires at least Eclipse 3.3 M6 in order to run.
